org.mozilla.javascript

Interface RegExpProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegExpImpl

    public interface RegExpProxy
    A proxy for the regexp package, so that the regexp package can be loaded optionally.
    Author:
    Norris Boyd
